 2005-10802005-05-31TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, IV, V AND VII) to the extent that some segments of the aviation industry will have to institute SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS within their own organization and appoint executives who would be accountable for their oversight.
